T02D2152:247b-1: yaksha se n'a pa ta ye bi shodha na ha ra s'a dha n'a ma /
T02D2152:247b-3: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams sbyong zhing sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2152:247b-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2152:247b-5: sku mdog mthing nag khros pa'i gzugs ldan shin tu 'jigs //
T02D2152:247b-6: gnod sbyin 'dul mdzad ma 'bar rdo rje 'dzin la gus btud de //
T02D2152:247b-7: las dang nyon mongs las dang rkyen gyis rab bskul nas //
T02D2152:247b-8: 'bras bu sdug bsngal gnod sbyin dug ni bsal phyir bri //
T02D2152:247b-9: lha yi bsnyen pa rab rdzogs shing //
T02D2152:247b-10: dul la snying brtser ldan pa dang //
T02D2152:247b-11: cho ga thabs la mkhas pa dang //
T02D2152:247b-12: dbang rdzogs nus pa ldan pas bzlog / khrus la sogs pa dang ldan pas //
T02D2152:247b-13: bum pa yungs kar le gas par brtag / rtags byung sgrub pa rab tu brtsam //
T02D2152:247b-15: bsrung dang sa chog rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2152:247b-16: mandal legs par byas nas ni //
T02D2152:247b-17: sta gon rdzogs par byas pa dang //
T02D2152:247b-18: dmar gtor bum pa lnga rnams dang //
T02D2152:247b-19: 'bru sna sman sna rin chen dang //
T02D2152:247b-20: khrag dang sha dang snying la sogs //
T02D2152:247b-21: rdzas dang sta gon rdzogs par bsags //
T02D2152:247b-22: de nas thig gis gdab bya ba //
T02D2152:247b-23: byin rlabs dam tshig can gyis bya //
T02D2152:247b-24: dang po tshangs thig gdab pa dang //
T02D2152:247b-25: zur dang logs dang cha chen dbye //
T02D2152:247b-26: sgo rgyan lha snam gnyis btab nas //
T02D2152:247b-27: de nas tshon rnams byin gyis brlab //
T02D2152:247b-28: dge ba 'khor lo lte bar ba cas //
T02D2152:247b-29: lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2152:247b-30: rdo rje sngon po bri bar bya //
T02D2152:247b-31: 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad ser po ste //
T02D2152:247b-32: shar du ral gri lhor dbyug pa //
T02D2152:247b-33: nub tu mdung ste dgra sta byang //
T02D2152:247b-34: shar lho 'khor lo lho nub mda' //
T02D2152:247b-35: nub byang gri gug byang shar tri sh'ul dgod //
T02D2152:247b-36: lha snam phyogs skyong bcu dgod do //
T02D2152:247b-37: de nas rdzas rnams dgram pa ni //
T02D2152:247b-38: dbus su bum pa sngon po dgod //
T02D2152:247b-39: phyogs bzhir rigs dang bstun pa'o //
T02D2152:247b-40: mtshams bzhir khrag gi gtor ma gzhag / grva rnams mchod pa sngon po bsham //
T02D2152:247b-41: phyogs skyong gtor ma sgo bzhir gzhag / nad pa khrus byas byang 'dug lho //
T02D2152:248a-2: de ltar rdzas rnams rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2152:248a-3: mchod bstod sngon du rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2152:248a-4: sngags kyis stong nyid bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2152:248a-5: de rjes sa bon h'um yig las //
T02D2152:248a-6: rdo rje ra gung sa gzhir gyur //
T02D2152:248a-7: de steng bh'um las gzhal yas ni //
T02D2152:248a-8: dur khrod 'jigs par bskyed par bya de nas gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2152:248a-9: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas //
T02D2152:248a-10: dra ba dra phyed rta babs so //
T02D2152:248a-11: dbus su nyi ma dbang po'i steng //
T02D2152:248a-12: h'um las bskyed pa'i rdo rje can //
T02D2152:248a-13: zhal gsum phyag drug rab bskyed nas //
T02D2152:248a-14: re pa la gnas h'um mthing nag / thugs kar rab tu bsgoms pa las //
T02D2152:248a-15: rtsibs brgyad re pha brgyad steng du ;
T02D2152:248a-16: / ksha las bskyed pa'i gnod sbyin ni //
T02D2152:248a-17: sha za dang ni ral pa can //
T02D2152:248a-18: gdong ser dang ni seng gdong ste //
T02D2152:248a-19: mo bzhi mtshams su rab bsam bya //
T02D2152:248a-20: rab tu smug nag shin tu dmar ba dang //
T02D2152:248a-21: rab tu 'bar ba'i gser bsregs dung mdog go //
T02D2152:248a-22: 'khor lo mda' dang gri gug tri sh'u la //
T02D2152:248a-23: g-yas na de rnams g-yon thod pa'o//
T02D2152:248a-24: shin tu 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mo //
T02D2152:248a-25: nyi ma'i dkyil na g-yas bskum bzhugs //
T02D2152:248a-26: bong bu sna dang rna ba 'phyang //
T02D2152:248a-27: ral pa gyen 'greng ral gri so //
T02D2152:248a-28: thal ba'i mdog dang dud ka dang //
T02D2152:248a-29: dmar nag shin tu gnag pa'o //
T02D2152:248a-30: ral gri dbyug ba mdung dang sgra sta dang //
T02D2152:248a-31: g-yas na de rnams g-yon na thod pa'o //
T02D2152:248a-32: shin tu 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin ni //
T02D2152:248a-33: nyi ma'i dkyil na brgyang bskum bzhugs //
T02D2152:248a-34: ye shes spyan drangs mchod nas bstim par bya'o //
T02D2152:248a-35: yaksha pidda ra n'a ya h'um phat //
T02D2152:248a-36: yaksha kro dha s'a dha n'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2152:248a-37: yaksha n'i l'am ba sa na ya h'um phat /
T02D2152:248a-38: yaksha aa pra ti ha ta p'a la ya h'um phat/ gnod sbyin ma rnams g-yo skor nas //
T02D2152:248a-39: 'jigs byed nod spyon gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2152:248a-40: yaksha pa ra kra m'a ya phat //
T02D2152:248a-41: raksha kri h'a nta ya phat /
T02D2152:248a-42: yaksha bi dhan ta r'u pa ya phat /
T02D2152:248a-43: raksha ro sha na ya phat /
T02D2152:248a-44: ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas //
T02D2152:248a-45: dus gsum chod pa rnams ldas mchod //
T02D2152:248a-46: bzlog dang las bcal man ngag bzhin //
T02D2152:248a-47: bgegs dang log 'dren las bcol bya ;
T02D2152:248a-48: / thod pa dur du nges par gzhug / bzlog
T02D2152:248a-49: na yungs kar rtags kyis brtag / mi ldog rtags
T02D2152:248a-51: h'um zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i sku //
T02D2152:248a-52: mthing nag mi 'gyur thugs rje can //
T02D2152:248a-53: gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D2152:248a-54: rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2152:248b-0: aom badzra @248b mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2152:248b-2: des ni 'bras bu bde thob shog / gnod sbyin
T02D2152:248b-3: gyi sgrub pa'i thabs nam gru'i rigs las byung ba
T02D2152:248b-4: dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dz'a ba ri pas
T02D2152:248b-7: // / bal po'i mkhan po de ba p'u rnam ti dang /
